wmndsFormLabelProps.name: contentText
wmndsFormLabelProps.description: Required. Text to use within the label. If contentHTML is provided this is not required and will be ignored.

wmndsFormLabelProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsFormLabelProps.description: Required. HTML to use within the label. If contentText is provided, this is not required.

wmndsFormLabelProps.name: for
wmndsFormLabelProps.description: Required. The value of the for attribute, the id of the input the label is associated with.

wmndsFormLabelProps.name: classes
wmndsFormLabelProps.description: Classes to add to the label tag.
